item.title: New Trump envoy says he will serve to make Greenland part of US
item.description: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

item.title: Élysée Palace staff member to stand trial over theft of precious tableware
item.description: Thomas M is accused of stealing solider silver and porcelain used for state banquets from France's presidential palace.

item.title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
item.description: Lt Gen Fanil Sarvarov is the third military official to have been killed in bomb attacks in the Russian capital over the last year.

item.title: Gold and silver hit records as investors hunt for safety
item.description: Investors are flocking to precious metals amid geopolitical tensions and expectations of more US interest rate cuts.

item.title: US pursuing third oil tanker linked to Venezuela, official says
item.description: The move comes days after President Donald Trump said that he was ordering a blockade of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.
